name: Polish tank adventures!
description:
Download the game:

http://mroziq.eu/pta/download

Play in your browser:

http://mroziq.eu/pta

Polish Tank Adventures is just a simple shooter game in 2d.

Your objective is just to kill all the enemys.

There's no specific objective.

W - move forward

S - move back

 A - move left

D - move right

Left click - shoot

Game made by Mroziq25.
